text: Björn Ove Christer Mattiasson (born 29 July 1971) is a Swedish footballer manager and former player. He played for Mariedals IK, Norrby IF, Byttorps IF, IF Elfsborg, AIK, Lillestrøm SK, Djurgårdens IF, IF Brommapojkarna, and Vallentuna BK and made two appearances for the Sweden national team. He was the Allsvenskan top scorer of 1997. ==Honours== ===Club=== Djurgårdens IF * Allsvenskan:http://www.difarkivet.se/dif_sm_guld_seniorer.pdf 2002, 2003 ===Individual=== * Allsvenskan top scorer: 1997 ==References== Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:Association football forwards Category:Swedish footballers Category:Sweden international footballers Category:Swedish football managers Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Eliteserien players Category:Norrby IF players Category:IF Elfsborg players Category:AIK Fotboll players Category:Lillestrøm SK players Category:Djurgårdens IF Fotboll players Category:IF Brommapojkarna players Category:Swedish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Norway
title: Christer Mattiasson
